She’s a volunteer at the library.
Volunteers cleaned the park on Saturday.
He’s a volunteer for the food bank.
The event needed more volunteers.

back_cards.definition_en: The act of assessing or judging
back_cards.example_en: The teacher’s evaluation of the project was fair.

back_cards.definition_en: A review of performance or quality
back_cards.example_en: Her job evaluation was excellent.

back_cards.definition_en: An analysis of data or results
back_cards.example_en: The evaluation showed positive trends.
The house underwent an evaluation.
The team’s evaluation led to changes.
Their views are opposite on the issue.
She lives on the opposite side of town.
The opposite team scored first.
The effect was opposite to what he expected.
The house is opposite the park.
The concert was totally awesome!
The awesome view took her breath away.
He’s an awesome friend to have.
The team’s performance was awesome.
That new game is so awesome.
